states.desc_401: Please log in to view this page
states.desc_403: You do not have permission to view this page. If you believe this to be an error, please contact your leader.
states.desc_404: The page you tried navigating to does not exist.
states.desc_500: The server encountered an unexpected error while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
states.desc_timeout: This might mean there was a problem communicating with the server.
states.desc_generic: Something went wrong while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

errors.full_name: Please provide a full name: minimum one first name + one last name, separated by whitespaces.
errors.required_for_freg: You have to fill out the person number field (11 digits) to be able to search the FREG.
errors.generic_freg: Something went wrong while communicating with FREG. Please try again later.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to see this content.

backend.internal_server_error: The server encountered an unexpected error while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.validation_error: There was a problem with the format of the submitted data.
backend.invalid_args: One or more required fields are missing. Please try again or contact support
backend.missing_fields: One or more required fields are missing.
backend.data_integrity_error: The server encountered an unknown error while handling your request. There could have been something wrong with the format of the submitted data, please review and try again. If the problem persists, please try again later or contact support.
backend.invalid_auth_code: Something went wrong during login. Please confirm that both the username and the password is correct. If the problem persists, please try again later or contact support.
backend.refresh_token_error: Your session has expired. Please log in again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
backend.auth_token_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
backend.token_error: Something went wrong with communication with the authorization provider. Please try again or contact support.
backend.missing_auth_token: Unauthorized attempt to access the system. Please log in.
backend.missing_permission: You lack the permissions to perform the request action. If you believe this to be an error, please contact support.
backend.person_404: The requested person was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.aggressor_404: The requested aggressor was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.victim_404: The requested victim was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.person_exists: The person with this person number is already registered in the system.
backend.case_404: The requested case was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.case_exists: There is already a case between these two persons registered in the systen.
backend.case_different_persons: A case has to be between two different persons.
backend.assessment_404: The requested risk assessment was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.assessment_case_404: Cannot start risk assessment for the requested case as the case does not appear to exists in the system. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
backend.assessment_complete: You cannot modify a completed risk assessment.
backend.invalid_category: Invalid cateogy. Please choose a valid category.
backend.help_404: The requested help page was not found in the system. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.mail_disabled: The server rejected the request to send email. This is likely because the server is running in a DEV environment. If you see this error message and are unsure what this means, please contact support.
backend.email_error: Something went wrong while sending email. Please contact support if the problem persists.

search.welcome_subtitle2: Search for past risk assessment or start a new one by searching in the field below
search.placeholder: Search for person number, DUF, assessment ID or case ID

persons.no_cases: There are no cases registered for this person.
persons.no_assessments: There are no risk assessments associated with this person. To start a new risk assessments, first create a new case.

1.cancel_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to cancel the risk assessment?
1.cancel_confirmation: The Risk Assessment and any data you have filled in will be deleted. It will not be possible to recover it.
1.intro_header: Checklist for assessment of risk of further partner violence
1.intro_desc: Spousal Assault RISK Assessment guide: Short Version, P.R. Kropp, S.D. Hart & H. Belfrage© 2005 ProActive ReSolutions Inc, Norsk versjon J. Aa Nøttestad & C.Lynum
1.intro_saving: Data is saved every five minutes. If you want to quit before completing the entire assessments, press "Save temporarily".
1.warning_1: This document includes information with the following distribution codes:
1.warning_2: H–1: Can not be used as evidence without permission
1.warning_3: H–2: Should not be distributed without permission
1.alt_address_description_helper: Type of address and why it is relevant for the risk assessment
1.relation_help: Status freg and short description of actual relation
1.are_children_involved: Do any of the parties have children?
1.information_sources_desc: Only choose information sources that are checked and/or used
1.used_source_other_desc_helper: Enter sources that do not fall under any of the above categories

help.title: Title
help.title_help: The title of the page this help page entails.
help.description_help: A short description of the relevant page.
help.content_help: The content that is displayed when the user requests help for the current page. Markdown formatting is supported.
